entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 04:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -25.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
